page.title: 16Heads of the Valleys Road
page.content: {HEADS OF THE VALLEYS ROAD} This three lane highway from Abergavenny to Hirwaun reaches a height of 1350 feet above sea level in this area.The weather conditions can be extremely severe in winter. Constructed during the early 1960s this road forms a border between the Brecon Beacons National Park to the north, and the South Wales Industrial Valleys to the south.We carried out a traffic survey on Friday 21st June at 9.30a.m. for half an hour. CARS---171 VANS----33 LORRIES-67 BUSES----2 OTHER----5 This road is well used and is an important link for our area and the M4 and M5.
